title: I am so done with the lore team
body: Tahm Kenchs lore... the video made it seem like it would have an awesome in depth lore like back in the day. Not the case sadly :^( Just your normal 3-liner thats been comming with every new champ in the last 6 months

replies.body:
The short character intro that you see in-client is not Tahm's complete bio. He will have an additional background and story text, though it will be a little off the beaten path due to his folklore nature.

I'll be writing something more substantive about the thinking behind the new format closer to when we show some examples before the end of the month.

Jaredan, you're a good guy. You've really tried, but come on. Look around. Everyone is sick of that. I get it, you have this "cool new idea" but look. We hate it. We fucking hate it. You take away our Institute of War, RETCON US, YOUR PLAYERS, FROM YOUR WORLD, and then give us summaries that barely describe the character and make champion bios this eyesore. Seriously, can't you make the font bigger? Reduce the page? Add silly concept drawings so it's not HERES LIKE, TWENTY WORDS AND A POT OF BLANK SPACE. Can we doodle on it at least?

I get it. There's this grand design. But, take a step back from going I HAVE A PLAN I'M HANNIBAL SMITH and look at your playerbase. Look at how Lore Team's Grand Design is working.

We. Fucking. Hate. It.

we hate each champion is 3 lines of lore that does not convey the champion. "Ammumu is a mummy. He is also very sad." Okay...uhm, anything else? Oh, I have to...go somewhere else to understand? What's next?
"Ahri is a fox turned kumiho. She eats livers." Because we all know someone will ignore the fact she doesn't eat livers, but eats LIFEFORCE. Why should I be worried that you'd ruin Ahri like that? 

Karma.
Trundle.
Let's throw Sejuani in there.

Narrative has a track record of changing stories and ruining already great champions. Sion was amazing, Gang plank looks really cool. But why should we see this as a new trend, when you already proved in the past you don't care for our input? You really don't. Look, many people have said just put the lore on the client while your tech issue is going on. Why is that impossible to do? Literally text is the easiest thing to do! 

Jaredan, your way doesn't work. It is alienating your playerbase, and you're slowly eroding every ounce of fucking trust you had. You realize you've pissed off more of Lore teams core fan base then even Kitae, right? And, TEN. MONTHS. LATER. Nothing.

Jaredan, just look at this thread. I've never seen these people, and they are speaking the same words the regulars in this board are.

Just...stop with this "we have a plan" because you're not doing anything right. Ant in Oz's thread up there has been posted to death but what has it done, beyond make it seem like you're working? You're entire secrecy act is ridiculous - most other teams don't work with such cloak and dagger. Even Skins doesn't - once it's release, they spill EVERYTHING. Tahm Kench released! Not a fucking word.

oh, also. Explain to me, Jarden, one thing. Narrative is divorcing Lore from Gameplay, that's your plan in the barebones. Then why do I have to go to Ekko's INGAME Voice over for more lore, when you've gone on record stating lore and gameplay are divorced. They aren't together. Why do I have to go to the game to find Stuff that shouldn't be there? Easter eggs sure. But important lore?

Unless you're definition of "divorce" is different then mine.

EDIT:

I need a proper micdrop.

Jaredan. In the time you've had to try and turn your entire Lore around and get this working, in those ten months, we've seen the promised skin from Morello, our begged for Sailor Moon Lux, the begged for Zac skin releasd, and out of league Shenmue 3, the Final Fantasy VII Remake, and Fallout 4 were announced.

And I don't even know if Lux is still the broken girl inside.
Stop saying "we" you don't speak for everyone.
No I dont, but I do speak for a lot of people.
Then say a lot of people, not "Everyone".
He never said "everyone", the term "we" is for more than one person. I agree with him, so now it classifies as "we", happy?

>Jaredan, you're a good guy. You've really tried, but come on. Look around. Everyone is sick of that.

Tada!  He did in fact use the word everyone.
I'll keep in mind to say "a big fucking chunk of your loyal fan base" instead of everyone or we.
How can you "hate" this new system when it's not even out yet and we know nothing about it?  Wait until you actually see the new stuff they keep teasing before you complain.

Person 1: Why are you shitting on the burger?

Person 2: Shut the fuck up, it's not complete yet, you have no idea how it will taste.
This wins an internet from me.

Two years of waiting after Kitae took over, now ten months of silence after we, the players, are retconned out of the universe and then our entire world, hell our MAP, is declared NONCANON.

I have the full right to judge a system they are saying is their new modus operandi, when it's spectacularly failed to a single tech issue.
Stop being naive. We are judging a full product here.

Excellent response, Xion. Really resonated.

Have some sea-salt ice cream. :^)

I will.

and I also forgot to add one final line for the micdrop.

Sailor Moon Lux skin? CHECK.
Zac skin? CHECK. 
Land shark Rek'Sai? CHECK. 
Shenmue 3, FFVII Remake, and Fallout 4 confirmed?  TRIPLE CHECK.

Shit no one expected to happen, things people begged for.

And I don't even know if Ahri still regrets the poor men and women who she seduced and sucked lifeforms from.

_Armored with absolute faith in her destiny, Sejuani pushed herself to extremes that would have killed anyone without her will to endure. **She walked into blizzards without food or furs and trained while frigid winds raked her flesh.** She clashed with the strongest warriors of her tribe, one after another, until her legs gave out beneath her._

Impervious to cold badass who has the sense to wear armour on the battlefield?

That extract went literally unchanged when they altered her background as part of the Freljord event.

And people wonder why Rioter's rarely post on complaint threads. This is the most civil response Jaredan could have gotten, yet they were still downvoted and you still insulted their integrity. *Despite* the fact that you could hold them accountable at the end of the month.

Regardless, I have to ask: Why does it matter? The old lore is still there, why does Riot have to cater it to you directly? I guess that it could encourage the Riot - Player relationship ... but, with respect, I doubt you care about that.

Excuse me? I absolutely care about Riot - Player relations. Why do you think I'm so upset and spent time writing that huge wall of text from my phone?  Fine, fuck the old lore. But they remove everything we love (we as in old lore fans) and replace it eith 3 line intros that tell me nothing beyond what a first glance would, and proceed to tell us nothing more, give us nothing, and leave us without even a map.

And yes. I could wait and hold them accountable in 19 or 20 days. But I already gave them 10 months. Soon, nearly a year.

I'm sorry, but I have no assurance anything will change by July 31st.

Smash Brothers.

Don't bring smash bros into this. Even smash has a backstory if you recall to smash bros 64, the nintendo characters are childs toys, in which the child would play with the toys giving them life and the ability to fight each other. In melee they became trophies and remained that way. The backstory has remained throughout the smash history. With each installation giving rise to more characters and more imagination.

Except Smash Brothers characters have all this history and lore behind them, it's why we care when they have a smackdown. It also helps that the games are short and fairly inconsequential.

League of Legends currently has no lore, the lore that it'll have will probably be fairly generic and bog-standard save for a few shining moments, and a match in the game is roughly 40 minutes long. That's a lot of time spent on something that's ultimately inconsequential.

Personally, I'm looking forward to seeing what you guys are trying to do. I understand people are frustrated with waiting and that they keep getting their hopes up--but let's face it. They're really just obsessed with consumer-entitlement and don't know what's going on behind the scenes so they throw huge fits because they don't see any real changes--even though the lore that has been provided in other places has been pretty significant.

I think that honestly the easiest way to get these people off your guys' backs is to somehow consolidate the lore that is released with a champion's Q&A, teaser, comic, or announcement into one place because they seem to be upset that it takes a bit of time to find the information in these different places--and they would like more word fluff. 

For instance, if this individual Tmoose had taken the time to look around, they would have discovered that Tahm Kench is a sort of demon-like being which feeds on the misery of others and is not particularly concerned with actual physical sustenance. He draws his energies from misery and inflicting the most that he possibly can. He also only possesses the form that he currently does because of how he has come to be viewed and understood by his victims and those that know of him. It would seem that he is an entity not unlike Pennywise from Stephen King's "It". They also would have found out that Tahm Kench has encountered all of the yordles in the League at some point and that they are listed as rivals--which would hint that certain elements may be revealed in the future about his interactions with them. Additionally, the sole ally listed for Tahm Kench is Aatrox which suggests that the pair are connected in some way; some have suggested that the two are connected by the pair's propensity for feeding off of energies produced by particular scenarios. It has also been confirmed that Twisted Fate is not the gypsy in question in the teaser for Tahm Kench--the teaser itself was an amazing way of delivering an understanding of what kind of persona Tahm Kench has, a valuable piece of lore in itself. 

Idk. I'm tired of you guys getting reamed because these people have no idea what's actually going on on your guys' end.

>For instance, if this individual Tmoose had taken the time to look around

That'd require a willingness to invest time. Considering the short lores don't invite to do so, the willingness of Riot to remove characters discourages so and the whole retcon makes fuzzy what is canon and what is not, I do not blame anyone of being unwilling to make such an investment.

Honestly, till your technical teamfix the "lore ingame/website" problem  (they are on that problem for 1 year now?) that forbid you to use the bigger bio that you have (because I assume every small bio champ already have a bigger bio ready to go live), you should stop reducing older bio to 3 sentence.
Keeping the old stuff hurt nothing (demacian, noxian,... still have them) and it doesn't give this feeling of "we remove thing but replace it with nothing and are fine with it"
